title: New: Circawaves – Get Away
content:
Circawaves have been an industry buzz band for the past few months, with their name cropping up all over the shop without actually having officially released a single note of music.

With Get Away, they explode onto the scene, with their infectious brand of The Libertines meets mid-00’s guitar pop. It’s not quite enough to have me as excited as Zane Lowe, who proclaimed it Hottest Record in the World, but it’s certainly a promising first step forward.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
